channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: SBF denies witness tampering in effort to avoid jail
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Lawyers for Sam Bankman-Fried claim that his alleged sharing of Caroline Ellison's diary with the New York Times does not amount to witness tampering.

item.title: FTX creditors unimpressed with exchange's bankruptcy exit plan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: FTX’s official creditor committee said the current plan would add costs and delays to what’s already on track to be a historically expensive bankruptcy.

item.title: MicroStrategy returns to profit and now owns $4.4B worth of Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Michael Saylor-founded MicroStrategy disclosed it now holds 152,800 Bitcoin as of July 30, and is back in the black.

item.title: GameStop will stop support for its crypto wallets, citing ‘regulatory uncertainty’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The retail company used to be known primarily for its brick-and-mortar retail stores but has also launched an NFT marketplace and a soon-to-be-canceled line of crypto wallets.

item.title: 3AC co-founder rejects jurisdiction of bankruptcy court, claiming he renounced US citizenship
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: As Singapore does not allow dual nationality, 3AC co-founder Kyle Davies said he chose to renounce his U.S. citizenship after getting married and receiving permanent residency.

item.title: Voyager customers targeted by scammers during 30-day withdrawal period: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Phony websites offered customers a premium for claiming through them. In reality, they drained customers’ wallets.

item.title: Curve liquidation risk poses systemic threat to DeFi even as founder scurries to repay loans
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: A Curve Finance hack sparked a sharp sell-off, and while DeFi traders stepped in to support CRV, the possibility of a contagion-level event remains.

item.title: Was Sam Bankman-Fried behind a scam project?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian J. Permal
item.description: This week’s episode of The Market Report explores allegations that SBF was behind the recent BALD token rug pull and dissects why Bitcoin is falling below $29,000.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: European digital asset manager CoinShares’ revenue up 33% in Q2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Proprietary trading activities contributed heavily to the revenue increase.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market down
is crypto in a bear market
when will bitcoin price go up
item.description: Bitcoin price is down today as the crypto market reacts to a project rug on Coinbase’s BASE chain and CRV liquidations impact investors’ confidence in altcoins.

item.title: Toyota GR Cup will award digital trophies on Polygon blockchain to race winners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Toyota continues its ongoing exploration into integrating blockchain technology within its corporate and developmental ecosystems.

item.title: Genesis Digital Assets opens three new facilities in South Carolina in US expansion
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The company has 400 MW of capacity spread across three continents, but most of its power is concentrated in Texas.

item.title: Binance Japan begins launching trading services for residents
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Japan-based crypto exchange said it was offering spot trading for 34 tokens as of Aug. 1, with plans to migrate global Binance users starting on Aug. 14.

item.title: Bitcoin investor sentiment slumps to a new low, even as macro and equities show improvement
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Three key Bitcoin price indicators explain why the BTC price continues to fall toward new lows.

item.title: Crypto trader weighs in on possible Bitcoin extinction scenarios
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Episode 11 of Cointelegraph’s Crypto Trading Secrets podcast features crypto trader Mohit Sorout.

item.title: Bitcoin price risks $25K dip despite ‘macro pivot point’ — New analysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price dips to six-week lows, but worse could be to come for Bitcoin, says Capriole Investments.

item.title: Bankruptcy judge signs off on order allowing Terraform Labs to subpoena FTX entities
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Terraform Labs claimed that the failures of its algorithmic stablecoin and governance token were the result of an attack from short-sellers, potentially involving Alameda Research.

item.title: 16 tips for managing the business development side of scaling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: To successfully scale, crypto and blockchain companies need to know as much about business development as they do about their technology.

item.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The crypto market is down today as traders assess the latest Curve Finance hack and the SEC's potential to target all altcoins in the future.

item.title: Nomura’s crypto arm Laser Digital bags Dubai VARA license
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hermi De Ramos
item.description: Laser Digital said it would also launch trading and asset management operations in the coming months, including over-the-counter service.

item.title: AI can be a ‘creative amplifier’ — Grammy chief exec Harvey Mason Jr.
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Cointelegraph spoke with Harvey Mason Jr. in an exclusive interview about how the Recording Academy sees the integration of AI in the future of the music industry.

item.title: SushiSwap furthers cross-chain functionality with Core integration
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: SushiSwap brings liquidity pools, cross-chain swaps and its DEX aggregator to the Core blockchain ecosystem.

item.title: FTX​ releases restructuring plan, hints at rebooted offshore exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Reams of dockets from FTX have been filed alongside a proposed reorganization plan that could see it resurrected as an offshore exchange.

item.title: AI mentions skyrocket in major tech companies’ Q2 calls
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: As major tech companies race to develop and deploy high-level AI systems, mentions of the technology are skyrocketing in company calls.

item.title: Bitcoin loses $29K as traders flag key BTC price levels to watch next
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin traders are particularly interested in the short-term holder cost basis as a potential BTC price support level.

item.title: Worldcoin launch sparks debate over data privacy and future of AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The Worldcoin launch has sparked a new debate on the future of decentralized identity, artificial intelligence and whether iris-scanning is the only way forward.

item.title: ConsenSys releases ‘fuzzing’ tool to test smart contract vulnerabilities
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Diligence Fuzzing lets developers introduce random and invalid data points to find security flaws.

item.title: Zero transfer scammer steals $20M USDT, gets blacklisted by Tether
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Zero transfer scams are becoming prominent in the crypto ecosystem, with over $40 million stolen in 2023.

item.title: Ukraine demands local crypto businesses provide financials
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Trading volumes on the Ukrainian crypto exchange Kuna have shrunk 90% since March 2023 due to government policies, the CEO said.
